alert.note: Alert for Kewaunee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 10:11AM CST until January 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL CONTINUE THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. The heaviest snowfall totals are expected across northern portions of the county, near Dyckesville, Duvall and Rosiere, where localized totals up to 6 inches will be possible. * WHERE...Kewaunee County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
